name: CommandGroup
desc: Command groups describe additional groupings of controls to add to existing command menus.

items.name: init(after: CommandGroupPlacement, addition: () -> Content)
items.desc: A value describing the addition of the given views to the end of the indicated group.

items.name: init(before: CommandGroupPlacement, addition: () -> Content)
items.desc: A value describing the addition of the given views to the beginning of the indicated group.

items.name: init(replacing: CommandGroupPlacement, addition: () -> Content)
items.desc: A value describing the complete replacement of the contents of the indicated group with the given views.

items.name: var body: some Commands
items.desc: The contents of the command hierarchy.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: The type of commands that represents the body of this command hierarchy.
